description: Joshua Schulte was sentenced in what the U.S. government described as the biggest theft of classified information in CIA history and for possession of child sexual abuse images and videos.
title: Former CIA engineer gets 40 years for giving agency's hacking secrets to WikiLeaks

description: Swift's popularity is being twisted into a threat by a contingent of far-right, Donald Trump-supporting conservatives. "Is Swift a front for a covert political agenda?" asked a Fox News host.
title: Here's why conspiracy theories about Taylor Swift and the Super Bowl are spreading

description: The World Health Organization has just released the latest worldwide statistics of the global burden of cancer. Here are five takeaways from WHO's top expert on cancer.
title: The breast cancer burden in lower income countries is even worse than we thought

description: Kai Wright's podcast revisits the early years of the HIV/AIDS epidemic, focusing in particular on populations that are frequently overlooked — including the pediatric patients at Harlem Hospital.
title: 'Blindspot' podcast offers a roadmap of social inequities during the AIDS crisis

description: TikTok faced scrutiny Wednesday along with other social media sites over child safety. But its Singaporean CEO was grilled over his nationality when a senator repeatedly asked whether he has CCP ties.
title: Sen. Tom Cotton repeatedly grills Singaporean TikTok CEO if he's a Chinese Communist

description: President Biden's executive order, issued Thursday, names four people and will lay the groundwork for financial sanctions against Israeli settlers who carry out violent assaults.
title: Biden issues order targeting Israeli settlers who attack West Bank Palestinians

description: This month, the network debuts Loveuary, a quartet of films inspired by the creativity and fandom of Regency-era novelist Jane Austen, including Sense and Sensibility with a mostly Black lead cast.
title: Hallmark recasts 'Sense and Sensibility' and debuts other Austen-inspired films

description: The remarks cap a tumultuous few weeks for Austin after it emerged that he was hospitalized on New Year's Day and that no one knew for days that he had undergone surgery for prostate cancer.
title: Defense Secretary Austin says he didn't handle news of hospitalization 'right'

description: Dr. Amir Khalil is attempting to coordinate a mission to rescue animals from the war-torn Gaza Strip.
title: Another side effect from war in Gaza? Animals starving in its besieged zoos

description: TikTok has removed all Universal Music Group music from its platform, according to a spokesperson for the company. UMG argues, among other things, that TikTok is not compensating its artists fairly.
title: TikTok removes music from UMG artists, including Olivia Rodrigo and Taylor Swift

description: An Israeli radio station is broadcasting messages and songs to hostages in Gaza, and a Palestinian station in the West Bank is broadcasting families' messages to relatives recently jailed in Israel.
title: Reaching hostages and prisoners, through Israeli and Palestinian radio

description: Farmers have blocked highways for days across the country to denounce low wages, heavy regulation and unfair competition from abroad. The unions said the new measures represented "tangible progress."
title: France's 2 key farmers unions suspend protests after new offers from the government

description: Hungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orbán had vetoed the aid package in December but joined other EU members in approving it at a summit in Brussels. His vote came with conditions the EU did not disclose.
title: European Union approves $54 billion aid for Ukraine as Hungary drops opposition

description: The House approved a bipartisan bill that would expand the child tax credit. As tensions between Zelenskyy and his military chief rise, the EU agrees to more than $50 billion in aid for Ukraine.
title: Up First briefing: Houses passes child tax credit bill; EU agrees on Ukraine aid

description: Oklahoma City and several other cities last year worked with NOAA to map neighborhoods to find out how heat impacts neighborhoods. The data can help cities prepare and adapt to a warmer world.
title: How mapping 'heat islands' can help cities prepare for extreme heat

description: Spiderwebs can capture environmental DNA, or eDNA, from vertebrate animals in their area, potentially making them a useful tool in animal monitoring, tracking and conservation.
title: Need to track animals around the world? Tap into the 'spider-verse,' scientists say

description: Residents of a South Korean island attacked by North Korea in 2010 fear it could become a flashpoint again. They hid in air raid shelters in early January after North Korea conducted artillery drills.
title: As North Korea launches missiles and artillery, this island's residents are terrified

description: Young voters and Native American voters are two groups that showed up for President Biden in the 2020 election. But ahead of his 2024 match-up, it's unclear if he'll be able to keep their support.
title: In Arizona, these young Native American voters seize their political power

description: Five authors, librarians and book shop owners suggest turning to literature to help teach kids about Black history, culture and themes for this Black History Month.
title: 6 books to help young readers learn about Black history

description: The short answer for why the Nevada GOP is holding its own presidential caucus two days after the state-run primary election: Republicans don't like Nevada's new voting rules.
title: Why Nevada has both a primary election and Republican caucus next week

description: Black smokers make up menthol tobacco's largest market, and have the highest rates of lung cancer. But the fight over banning menthol is a complex and divisive issue in the Black community.
title: The fight over banning menthol cigarettes has a long history steeped in race

description: Automakers including Tesla, General Motors, Volkswagen and Toyota are failing to ensure they are not using forced labor as part of their China supply chains, a report by Human Rights Watch says.
title: Rights group warns major carmakers over risk of forced labor in China supply chains

description: A hangar under construction on the grounds of the airport in Boise, Idaho, collapsed Wednesday, killing three people and injuring another nine, officials said.
title: 3 people are killed and 9 injured after a hangar collapses at an Idaho airport

description: A grand jury in Santa Fe indicted Baldwin in January after prosecutors received a new analysis of a gun the actor pointed at cinematographer Halyna Hutchins during rehearsal for the film Rust.
title: Alec Baldwin pleads not guilty to involuntary manslaughter in fatal film set shooting

description: The bill includes $33 billion to expand the widely used child tax credit for three years — including the tax season currently underway, provided the bill quickly passes the Senate.
title: House passes bipartisan tax bill to expand child tax credit
